title: Disturb
description:
THE TERROR BEGINS...
A medical investigator tormented by secret guilt.A beautiful doctor with an illicit desire.A millionaire businessman indulging a passion for murder.And a human guinea pig who has been awake for seven straight weeks.
...WHEN YOU CLOSE YOUR EYES
DISTURB by JA KonrathYou'll never sleep again...If you are a more sensitive (or adventurous) reader, this handy scale rates specific categories from 1 (lowest) to 10 (highest) to give you some idea if this is your kind of book.DISTURBScary - 6Violent - 6Funny - 2Sexy - 3Crossovers - Includes characters from the Konrath Dark Thriller Collective, the Jack Daniels thrillers, the Codename: Chandler series, and the Timecaster series.
author: J.A. Konrath
